entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Varennes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
